location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Lieutenant William Bruce, Resident, Bushire, to Francis Warden, Chief Secretary to the Government, Bombay

mods.abstract: Letter states that William Bruce has received a letter from the Broker at Muscat reporting that the Imam of Muscat has made peace with the Joassimees [QawƒÅsim]. Bruce offers his opinion that this peace will not be a lasting one.
